## BlockDragSurfaceSvg.getGroup() method

Provide a reference to the drag group (primarily for BlockSvg.getRelativeToSurfaceXY).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGroup(): SVGElement | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

SVGElement \| null

Drag surface group element.
